Posts.Content: Jan 13, 2008 11:09AM trudy wrote: Hi All.  I came across this thread and the shoe fits.  I start TC chemo 1/15, port going in tomorrow 1/14.  DX: IDC, triple negative, 0/3nodes, Stage 1, Grade 3, modified radical left breast 11/29 due to widespread DCIS in addition to the 7mm IDC.  Odd part was biopsy 10/4 showing focal vascular invasion, but path report after surgery showed no focal vascular invasion.  I don't know what to think about that.  Anybody else have a discrepency like this?  Sorry to be joining the group, but very happy to have somebody to 'dump' on !!'  Trudy
Posts.Title: Jan 2008--Ain't it Great? Determined1 Diana63
